description: Outbuilding at rear for use as gym / home office
decision_conditions: <p>The proposal, by reason of the excessive bulk, scale and height in close proximity to the rear of No.64 Moat Drive, would be detrimental to the amenities of the neighbouring occupiers at that property in terms of overbearing impact, outlook and sense of enclosure, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3.D(7) of the London Plan (2021),&nbsp;Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan document (2013) and Policy CS1 of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012)&nbsp;and the relevant provisions of the adopted Harrow Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide (2010).<br></p>

<p> The proposed outbuilding, by reason of its&nbsp; overall scale and height&nbsp;would fail to respect the prevailing pattern of the development in the locality, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the area, contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policies D3 (D(1)) and D(11)) of The London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1 (B) of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policies DM1 A, B (a), (b) and (c) of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).<br></p>
